entry.title: Losing or gaining control (is sometimes closer to each other than you think)
entry.summary:
Author: sword_and_shield_22

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 70,318Chapters: 16/?Kudos: 51

Summary: Merlin has never learnt to control his magic. It is completely guided by his emotions and that usually doesn't turn out well.Arthur was chased out of Camelot as a young prince. His own sister killed their father and now he is just waiting for the right moment to reclaim his kingdom.When Merlin and Arthur meet, a hope seems to take root in the world that all will be well.Magical figures, dark magic, lies and betrayal make their experiences together anything but easy. But deep friendships, trust, loyalty and love bring them ever closer to their goal.Will Merlin find the control he needs and can Arthur forget his past to open his heart?

entry.title: Beneath the Surface
entry.summary:
Author: BlueGrassSax

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 154,658Chapters: 48/?Kudos: 642

Summary: Camelot is a lot bigger than the letter suggested it to be.The buildings here tower at three stories tall, sometimes even four, and that’s only in the lower town. The battlements alone leave trailing shadows over the roads, the stone and brick laid down who-knows how long ago.Merlin clutches Gaius’ letter close, looking down every now and then to recheck the directions. The roads are winding and narrow with more than a few dead-ends.His offer hangs just under the directions:"Mentor under me and I can teach you the control you seek – a physician’s apprentice is a noble trade not many young men have the opportunity to undertake. Do you understand?"Merlin didn’t understand at first, not until Hunith pressed a set of Will’s old clothes into confused hands. As tough as it is for a sheltered boy to saunter into a new city to take a position under an esteemed healer – not even considering the illegalities of the implied additional tutelage – it would be an impossibility for even the most headstrong of women.

entry.title: The Final Sanctuary
entry.summary:
Author: BeautifulFiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 60,606Chapters: 12/12Kudos: 667

Summary: Perhaps he could have ignored the glittering motes of magic that danced through the room. He could have blamed this strange place of power for their presence, but he could not deny the truth that made itself plain before him, painted in blue eyes turned to bright, brazen gold. Merlin was a sorcerer. ---When Sir Leon is gravely injured, Arthur, Merlin and the knights seek shelter in an old Sanctuary cave, but the magic within is far from powerless, and the goddess is always watching. Can they overcome their fears and find their way back to freedom, or will they be lost forever in their own enmity?

entry.title: Where a Lot of People Team Up and Try to Destroy One Another (A BBC Merlin and Harry Potter crossover)
entry.summary:
Author: StupefymeWholly

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,026Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 2

Summary: Just months after the fall of Voldemort, as the magical world struggles to heal, Merlin receives a letter from Hecate bearing a prophecy — one that speaks of the return of long-lost friends... and long-forgotten enemies.He and Leon race back to England and quietly join the Hogwarts faculty under the Headmistress’s protection, waiting for Samhain, when the veil will thin and the lake of Avalon will stir. Arthur and his knights are fated to rise again — but so is a darkness that once tore their world apart.Old allies must forge new swords with dragonfire. Morgana must choose between blood and redemption. And across the shadowed moors, a sister threatens to raise an army of the dead.As magic’s fate teeters on the edge, the line between kin and foe blurs once more.The once and future king returns — but will the world survive this war?

entry.title: From Fire by Fire
entry.summary:
Author: guinever

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,192Chapters: 7/14Kudos: 89

Summary: “Merlin. Even if you’re … even if you’re right, it doesn’t matter. It’s too late. He’s going to kill me. And I—listen to me, you idiot. I don’t want you to watch. And I don’t want you to be next.” orAfter confronting Morgause's vision of his mother, Arthur rides for Camelot, intending to make his father pay for his hypocrisy. He falls short of luck, for the King has fallen back on the counsel of his faithful Witchfinder, Aredian, who is convinced that Arthur is not Arthur, the crown prince, but a changeling, bound to Morgause's will and let loose upon Camelot to usurp Uther of his crown.As Arthur is dragged away to the dungeons, sentenced to a death by fire, Merlin must race against time to change the course of events which seem to spell out Arthur's demise. Time is scarce, however, and for all intents and purposes, it might be too late already.

entry.title: You were the one to teach me how to use knives: Vol 4
entry.summary:
Author: Obsessedwithfanfiction

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 145,620Chapters: 29/?Kudos: 314

Summary: Morgana's back in Camelot, but she's more alone than ever, having cast a spell that's made everyone forget about her magic. Forced back into the position she was in a year ago, she's determined that she won't feel as hopeless. She's a High Priestess now, and she has her sister firmly in her corner. As more things about the year she missed come to light however, she'll have to grapple with wondering whether she made the right choice- and whether her heart can take any more secrets being revealed.

entry.title: Do you feel like a young god?
entry.summary:
Author: MedaLeda

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 25,847Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 36

Summary: Deep in the forest an ancient temple slumbers, the legacy of a god carved into its walls, a promise of salvation and a promise of eternity.Arthur Pendragon didn't go looking for the prophecy of the Once and Future king, but when a stranger pushes it into his lap he can't let go. Who the hell is Emrys, and why would a sorcerer help him in the first place? The druids hold the key, but the path to discovery is long, and he may soon wish he'd never step foot on it all. When a tragic sacrifice is made, Arthur is left with a choice between betrayal and forgiveness, understanding and ignorance, love and hate.Meanwhile Merlin would follow his king anywhere, and he has. He could never bring himself to regret following Arthur that day, but he would always wonder how different life could have been if he had somehow convinced him to just go home. Tortured peasant boys don't make good Gods, and the consequences have the potential to change the world - if he could only escape the Sarrum long enough to try.or: The one where Emrys is a God and doesn't know it, Arthur pushes until he breaks, Sarrum is evil and Merlin never wanted any of this to happen. Mordred's just happy to be here.PRE WRITTEN

entry.title: Hide and Seek
entry.summary:
Author: DragonBinx

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,092Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 49

Summary: The throne room was silent, which was unusual on a Tuesday afternoon since that was when the Round Table had their weekly meeting.  Today, however, Arthur had dismissed his knights early, as there was no current crisis to manage or tricky problem for them to pick through, and it was a lovely day outside.  He only had a few more reports to read before he put down his work for the day himself and spent the rest of his evening with his family.  Merlin had no pressing matters to deal with today and was instead somewhere in the castle, playing with their daughter.  Arthur intended to join them as soon as possible.   As if Arthur’s thoughts had summoned him, Merlin burst through the doors.  Arthur smiled at him, dropping the reports and standing, happy to have the excuse to give up on his duties early. "Merlin, I was just thinking -"   “I lost Clara!”  Merlin loses their daughter during a game of hide and seek, and he and Arthur have to figure out why she's so hard to find.

entry.title: A Legend that Begins With a Crush
entry.summary:
Author: Clearwater96

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,301,728Chapters: 84/?Kudos: 1,235

Summary: Arthur Pendragon and Merlin were literally from two different worlds. One is a prince from a great kingdom and the other a common farm boy from the next kingdom over. These two should have never met.But that was before they realized their parents were once friends and arranged the two of them to marry when they reached adulthood. That was before Uther turned on magic and Hunith went on the run with her infant son.Now, twenty years have passed and the Prince, Arthur Pendragon is far out of his depth. After four months of marriage and learning what he has about Merlin, he knows that things need to change, but doesn’t know what can be done.And with every attempt at trying going wrong, with mysterious boys showing up wanting to be a knight, strange physician’s trying to coerce his consort away, even stranger ladies who’ve seen to weaken Arthur’s brain, and the arrival of an odd Druid boy they need to risk it all just to get to safety…will Arthur ever get things to go right?

entry.title: One More Time
entry.summary:
Author: orphan_account

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,476Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 1

Summary: Merlin and Leon have been off the grid, researching rare herbs across the Atlantic—until a cryptic prophecy from Hecate sends them rushing back to England. Hogwarts is still recovering from the scars of war, but some things never rest. As Arthur and his knights return from Avalon’s depths at Samhain, old friends and foes alike find themselves caught in a web of magic, dragons, and destinies rewritten. Morgana’s making unexpected choices, while Maurelle summons shadows best left alone. With swords reforged by dragonfire, and an army rising from the dead, can they face what’s coming… one more time?

entry.title: Unbreakable Chains
entry.summary:
Author: Ireadtoomanybooks

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,627Chapters: 27/?Kudos: 285

Summary: Merlin never wanted to come to Camelot. But with his home reduced to ashes and nowhere else to turn, he has no choice but to seek refuge with his uncle, a court physician under King Uther’s rule. All he wants is a quiet life—one of healing, learning, and keeping his strange gifts hidden.But the moment he steps within Camelot’s walls, he feels it. A presence watching. A hunger waiting.Prince Arthur Pendragon is nothing like the noble protector of legends. He is ruthless, possessive, and drawn to Merlin in ways neither of them fully understand. Every time Merlin tries to escape, Arthur is there to catch him—tender, terrifying, and utterly unwilling to let him go.

entry.title: A Dream of Spring
entry.summary:
Author: OnceUponBacktoTheFuture

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,405Chapters: 34/38Kudos: 60

Summary: When Camelot falls to a cruel king, Arthur and Merlin must find and rally their scattered friends to take back the kingdom. But after Arthur discovers Merlin's secret, he begins to see him differently. Can Arthur accept who they both are, or will they get lost in this new and dangerous Camelot, crawling with nightmares and daydreams, old friends and new enemies?
